data.title: Jared Harris
data.text:
AKA Jared Francis Harris

Born: 24-Aug-1961

Birthplace: London, England

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: I Shot Andy Warhol

Father: Richard Harris (actor, b. 1-Oct-1930, d. 25-Oct-2002)

Mother: Elizabeth Rees

Brother: Damian Harris (b. 1958)

Brother: Jamie Harris (b. 1965)

Wife: Emilia Fox (actress, m. 16-Jul-2005, div. 2010)

Wife: Allegra Riggio (together since 2009, m. 9-Nov-2013)

University: Duke University

TELEVISION

Mad Men Lane Pryce (2009-10)

Fringe David Robert Jones (2008-)

The Riches Eamon Quinn (2008)
